item.title: Boredom is a Good Thing
item.description: Do you remember a decade or two ago when you were bored? Do you remember how it felt? Not knowing what to do? Bouncing out ideas with your friends (or imaginary friends)? Did you stop to think about how I asked “a decade or two ago” and not “a week or two ago” or even “a year or two ago”? When was the last time you were bored? It’s hard to feel bored with the constant notifications and noise around us due to technology.
